review_data.title: Abwechslung im Quartier

review_data.title: Sehr gutes italienisches Restaurant

review_data.title: New owners - massive improvement
review_data.content: Thought we'd try our local as it has changed hands. The outside terrace was very busy, so we decided to eat inside. The welcome was warm. Waiting staff very busy but we didn't have to wait long. The menu is decidedly Italian with a few...More

review_data.title: Geheim Tip im Quartier, sehr
review_data.content: Geheim Tip im Quartier, sehr nettes Personal. Kleiner gemütlicher Garten unter den Bäumen. Sehr gutes Preis Leistungsverhälltnis Gutes Essen 👍🏽👍🏽

review_data.title: Top 2 Restaurant for Altstetten Area, Great Pizza & Pasta
review_data.content: This is probably my second-favorite restaurant in the immediate Altstetten area, coming in right after the La Taqueria. Food is always good and the value-for-money is also excellent (considering Zurich prices). I live nearby, so I've probably been here 15-20 times in the past year...More

review_data.title: Einfach genial
